subject: PGA Championship
Golf
Texas Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Steven Bowditch of Australia claimed his maiden win on the PGA Tour, carding a four-over-par 76 for a one-shot victory at the Texas Open in San Antonio.
snippet: Steven Bowditch of Australia claimed his maiden win on the PGA Tour, carding a four-over-par 76 for a one-shot victory at the Texas Open in San Antonio.
